definition: see 過失致死罪|过失致死罪[guo4 shi1 zhi4 si3 zui4]
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: Baer was charged with manslaughter but later was acquitted of all charges.
sentences.chinese: 狽爾被控過失殺人，但後來所有指控被撤銷了。

sentences.english: The Oscar-winning scribe was charged with vehicular manslaughter.
sentences.chinese: 這位奧斯卡最佳編劇獎獲得者被控過失殺人。

sentences.english: The van's 72-year-old driver was arrested on charges of criminally negligent homicide and driving without a license.
sentences.chinese: 該貨車72歲的司機以過失殺人和無照駕駛被逮捕。
